title: Problem creating PBE account
body:
Hello, I was recently accepted into PBE but when I click on the email to make the account, it simply say's i'm still pending for approval. Can someone explain what I can do or help me out?

Thank you very much. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I took a look into your account and it doesn't seem like this one has been approved for PBE quite yet. If you did receive a confirmation e-mail for PBE, be sure to check that it wasn't meant for any other accounts your may have.

Let me know if that clears things up.
